text: Consists of a barrel, a bolt carrier group, and a handguard, all of which enable the use of the rifle as one would expect to.
This upper receiver is chambered in 5.56mm NATO/.223 Remington.
The barrel is 16 inches long, and is often used for long-range shooting, though it can just as easily be used against closer targets.
The barrel is 20 inches long, and is often used for long-range shooting, though it can also be used against closer targets.
